programme.title: Sunny Side Up
programme.desc: Arasi is hesitant about returning to SSU Press but with Terence's encouragement, she decides to give it another shot. Chan delegates the National Day decorations responsibilities to Robert while Chandra is drawn deeper into Joseph's lies.

programme.title: On The Red Dot - My Unique Farm
programme.desc: (Encore) Desmond Chow developed the world's first crawfish reproductive technology, which breed crawfish that are disease resistant. Ming Tan checks out his crawfish innovation in Cambodia.

programme.title: Whispers Of The Dead
programme.desc: An infant dies unnaturally. Armed with his autopsy report, Prof Chao identifies the cause of the infant's death.

programme.title: The Wall UK S3
programme.desc: The Wall is a wildly unpredictable, fast and simple game show with huge cash sums on the line. Two players must work together to tackle the mammoth four-storey-high wall. Emotions run high as the pair's faith in one another is tested by unpredictable outcomes and ever-rising stakes. The rules are simple. If the players answer a trivia question correctly, the ball turns green as it falls randomly down the wall towards slots of varying cash amounts.

programme.title: Don't Forget The Lyrics USA S5
programme.desc: Don't Forget the Lyrics! is an American television game show in which contestants compete to win $1 million by correctly recalling song lyrics from a variety of genres.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S4
programme.desc: Nature is a tempestuous beast, capable of destruction on a level so devastating and claimed the lives of millions. In recent years, these extreme weather events have become more and more commonplace. Using incredible archive and astonishing user-generated footage of some of the most extraordinary weather the planet has ever seen, we'll relive these weather spectacles in astonishing minute by minute detail, revealing very personal stories of people who have captured the entire event on camera.

programme.title: Jimmy Shu's Taste Of The Territory
programme.desc: Jimmy Shu is at the busy Parap Saturday markets where he tells us that street food is one of the best ways to get to know a culture. In this episode he tastes some of Darwin's most popular street food. Jimmy talks about Darwin's Laksa obsession and takes us to Mary's Laksa stall to meet Mary who has been making Darwin's most famous Laksa for over 20 years. Jimmy tries one of Mary's famous laksas.

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune S40
programme.desc: All new season of Wheel of Fortune.

programme.title: Field Trip with Curtis Stone S1
programme.desc: Curtis travels to the Lombardy region at the base of the Italian Alps to discover a local cheese and peasant dish. He subsequently embarks on a helicopter tour of a prestigious Franciacorta vineyard to pick up sparkling wine to pair with the decadent sturgeon caviar produced in the area.

programme.title: Luke Nguyen's Vietnam
programme.desc: Luke reaches the bustling city of Hanoi, where he gives a how-to guide on the vibrant street-food scene. Visiting Ms Hong, he helps prepare a Hanoi favourite - bun cha. He stops off for some yogurt coffee and partakes in an old snake meal ritual with interesting results. Hanoi at night comes alive as Luke prepares a local favourite, cha ca (grilled fish with aromatic herbs), on a street completely dedicated to that particular dish.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst S1
programme.desc: After a pep talk from the team, it's Ken's turn to take on the Sword Flames. With new found determination and his friends behind him, Ken appears more powerful than ever before. But will it be enough to claim victory for the Beigoma Academy Bey Club?

programme.title: Supa Strikas S1-S6
programme.desc: Follow Shakes, Rasta and the rest of the Supa Strikas on their quest to become the world's greatest football team!

programme.title: Nefertine On The Nile
programme.desc: Nefertine is an eight-year-old girl who lives in ancient Egypt and is gifted with inexhaustible curiosity and courage. She occasionally gets herself into sticky situations, but luckily her trusted friend Piramses is always there to give her a hand. The two friends, accompanied by the cat Micerina, go on incredible adventures, from investigating mysterious mummies to discovering the secrets of the sphinx!

programme.title: Titipo The Little Train S1
programme.desc: Diesel gets an autograph by a superstar, which is a dream come true for him. Determined to keep that autograph forever, he refuses to get washed and get dirtier day by day. He starts to even smell. His friends beg Diesel to wash, but he's just too stubborn.

programme.title: Ollie And Friends S6
programme.desc: The gang and the Triangle Aliens are working on a new train for Ollipolis. But when one of the aliens decides to help move things along, the train runs away at super speed! The Aliens teleport a variety of animals from different habitats to the park and they learn the hard way why these animals don't live together. With the gang's help, they return the animals to their natural habitats.

programme.title: Pinkfong Songs & Stories
programme.desc: Enjoy the best of Pinkfong's most loved songs and stories with all your favourite characters!

programme.title: Sesame Street S48
programme.desc: Catch a brand new segment starring Cookie Monster in Cookie Monster's Foodie Truck. And look out for special guest appearances by international Sesame Street characters Chamki (from Galli Galli Sim Sim), Lily (from Zhima Jie: Da Niao Kan Shijie) and Zuzu (from Takalani Sesame).

programme.title: Dora And Friends: Into The City S2
programme.desc: Dora, a young girl, starts going to school in the city of Playa Verde. Along with her friends, Kate, Naiya, Emma, Alana and Pablo, Dora embarks on various adventures to explore the city.

programme.title: Leo The Wildlife Ranger: S3 Spinoff
programme.desc: The Junior Rangers come across a crocodile that is having the worst of days. Nothing seems to be going right for the poor reptile. The Junior Rangers help it out as the crocodile encounters various issues throughout the day.

programme.title: Leo The Wildlife Ranger: S3 Spinoff
programme.desc: The Junior Rangers help a family of Asian House Shrews overcome obstacles in their path to escape a hungry predator.

programme.title: Deals For Joy

programme.title: Deals For Joy
programme.desc: Discover how you can wake up every morning glowing and refreshed as our hosts prove how a comfortable pillow is key for a good night's sleep.

programme.title: Luke Nguyen's Vietnam
programme.desc: Continuing his journey in the bustling city of Hanoi, Luke is up bright-and-early to cook one of Vietnam's most famous dishes, pho bo (beef noodle soup with rice noodles). After perfecting this well known broth, he ventures to one of the outskirts of this amazing city to learn how rice paper is made, which he immediately applies to his spring roll recipe. In the greater parts of Hanoi, pork terrine and green rice are also on the menu.

programme.title: Field Trip with Curtis Stone S1
programme.desc: Heading up the coast on Highway 1 to discover the jewels of the Pacific, Curtis visits with a couple who turned from tech to cheesemaking, savors sea urchin with the only female uni diver in California in Santa Barbara, and finds inspiration at seaweed & abalone farms in Monterey. The trip culminates in a meal at Ridge Vineyard where Curtis creates a dish to bring back to Maude.

It's the end of the dry season and there are plenty of magpie geese in the waterways of Kakadu.

programme.title: Magic Adventures: The Crystal Of Dark

Together they embark on a dangerous quest to find 4 great wizards and 7 magic crystals that will help her stop the Dark wizard and save her parents, and they learn that real magic is having good virtues of courage, friendship, and cooperation.

programme.desc: Mei gets into a quarrel with Dhana. Then in an argument with Everest, Mei sends him squealing to Dhana about something terrible she did on Whoopie's World.

programme.desc: The World Sailing Show is the official international sailing series of the sailing federation World Sailing and is a monthly digest of everything that matters in the sport. programme.title: 棘手问题
programme.desc: (重) 一些科学家指出，如果我们继续以这样的速度产生温室气体，我们将可以看到更多的害虫。地球暖化不仅会导致害虫数量增加，也会让它们的食欲大增。事实上，如淡滨尼和樟宜那么大的一群蝗虫，就可以在一天内，摧毁足够养活新加坡10倍人口的粮食。就目前来说，全球有10%到15%的农作物遭害虫所破坏，而气温每上升一个摄氏度，全球的粮食产量就会下降10%到25%。尽管我们的粮食供应受到地球暖化的威胁，我们目前的饮食习惯却也是导致地球暖化的原因之一。从饲养牲畜、种植蔬菜，到加工及运输……只要你进食，你就属于占全球温室气体排.

programme.title: 香港原味道 （第四辑）
programme.desc: (重)《香港原味道》新四辑，谭玉瑛第四次领军，带着黄庭锋、孔德贤、林正峰继续追味寻源，从香港农田、鱼排，见证当地农业、渔业的发展。深入土炮食材的产地，寻找真正来自当地或香港制造的优质食材。每集深入认识一种地道食材，走进当地鱼场、鲜果园、鲜菜园、水耕菜工场、食品厂、酱油厂等等，发掘更多当地饮食智慧，品尝每一口新鲜美味，探索每一种港产食材背后的故事。.

programme.title: 热血合唱团

programme.title: 看不见的设计
programme.desc: (重) 熟食中心，是一座城市的文化缩影。不同年代的熟食中心建筑内外设计里到底暗藏了什么玄机，让它成为新加坡人心目中的国民食堂？大部分熟食中心的桌椅都是固定的，这背后有什么用意？而桌子的间距设计又加入了哪些食客心理层面的考量呢？通过摄影师的艺术审美角度去观察，熟食中心又形成了一道不一样的美丽风景线。.

programme.title: 我的老板是只猫
programme.desc: (PG)(重) 身为猫妖少主的雷昊阳其实厌倦自诩为万物之灵的人类，看着眼下多少人类甘心为猫奴就知道他们的智商指数多低。为了报答蒋可淇幼时救他的恩情，雷昊阳留在人间暗中资助蒋可淇长大成人。为了实现她当女强人的愿望，成立公司雇用她培养接班能力，没想到她现在要为了完成爷爷愿望努力相亲把自己嫁出去！行，为了报恩，他可以！雷昊阳忍辱负重恢复成猫身潜入蒋可淇家中，被当流浪猫喂食以便探知她的择偶标准，安排相亲却总忍不住搞破坏，却在过程中被蒋可淇激怒，鄙视人类爱情的雷昊阳因此扬言对她展开追求。原本只是要教训恩人而展开的假.
